about_the_game:
I made this game by myself. I'm an old player worthy of the name. Because I love the round system, which lasted for 6 years. The code began to learn from the basis of 0. There is nothing fancy. It is a practical way to play. Free trading is the core of the game.
No team, a game developed by one person. I wanted to give up several times on the way, because there were many difficulties in development. Every step was a tough battle, because I persisted in my love for the round system~
Taptap received more than 50000 attention, and its best score ranked sixth in the popular list.
Now the steam platform is open for testing. You can apply for testing. Thank you.

[game features]
[classic combat mode] - classic round combat mode, supporting multiple lineup configurations
[free trade] - support players to trade items
[level mechanisms with different styles] - copy mechanisms are different, waiting for you to explore and discover
[real time matching ladder competition] - real time online cross server matching, fair round duel, skill matching is uncertain, and only routine can win the world
[skill combinations with various playing methods] - more than 30 featured generals and more than 70 skill combinations. More wonderful combinations are waiting for you to find
[fast fighting and minimalist function] - simplify the player's operation, experience the fun of brushing monsters, burn your brain and relax
detailed_description:
I made this game by myself. I'm an old player worthy of the name. Because I love the round system, which lasted for 6 years. The code began to learn from the basis of 0. There is nothing fancy. It is a practical way to play. Free trading is the core of the game.
No team, a game developed by one person. I wanted to give up several times on the way, because there were many difficulties in development. Every step was a tough battle, because I persisted in my love for the round system~
Taptap received more than 50000 attention, and its best score ranked sixth in the popular list.
Now the steam platform is open for testing. You can apply for testing. Thank you.

[game features]
[classic combat mode] - classic round combat mode, supporting multiple lineup configurations
[free trade] - support players to trade items
[level mechanisms with different styles] - copy mechanisms are different, waiting for you to explore and discover
[real time matching ladder competition] - real time online cross server matching, fair round duel, skill matching is uncertain, and only routine can win the world
[skill combinations with various playing methods] - more than 30 featured generals and more than 70 skill combinations. More wonderful combinations are waiting for you to find
[fast fighting and minimalist function] - simplify the player's operation, experience the fun of brushing monsters, burn your brain and relax

short_description: 一个独立开发的，基于三国背景的回合制游戏。 配置武将阵容、洗练技能、打通主线关卡，每日可以参加很多副本活动。
